name: Dragon Rush (Lunar Cowboy Games)
description:
Get ready for the ride of a lifetime!

Dragon rush is an adrenaline-pumping runner on top of a rollercoaster, dodge, jump, and use power ups in order to survive the Dragon, and customize your character with a selection of unique hats along the way!

Features:
Infinite Levels!

Multiple Power Ups!

Lots of hats to customize your character!

Can you escape?
